net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_RollExpression_TargetCheck
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Creates a Check Target RollExpression with an optional provided name.
There is no roll for a check target. Just a boolean expression based on the token

arg(0) = optional name
arg(1) = optional boolean expression

A roll expression that can be used to check the target state.
If the expression returns false, no more steps are executed
